byline.original: By JACK HEALY and SANGAR RAHIMI
byline.contributor: Lydia Polgreen contributed reporting from New Delhi.

snippet: Afghan security officials announced that they had arrested six suspects in an attempted assassination plot against President Hamid Karzai, including a security guard at the presidential palace.
lead_paragraph: Afghan security officials announced that they had arrested six suspects in an attempted assassination plot against President Hamid Karzai, including a security guard at the presidential palace.

headline.main: Plot to Kill Afghan President Karzai Is Foiled
headline.print_headline: Afghan Officials Report Foiled Plot, Tied to Al Qaeda, to Kill President Karzai
headline.seo: Karzai Assassination Plot Foiled, Afghan Officials Say
